text: Soni ngasinyyilupataga ichindu yaapeleche Allah mwawinji kwa wane mwa jenumanja kwapunda wane, akwete kupata achalume liunjili lya (malipilo ga) yapanganyisye, nombe nao achakongwe akwete kupata liunjili lya (malipililo ga) yapanganyisye, ni mum'bendeje Allah ukoto Wakwe, chisimu Allah chindu chilichose awele Jwaachimanya chenene
